title: Donald Trump removed his pro-life policy 12 hours after the election?
subtitle: An article quoted on the "Stel magnifikat" blog has since claimed that Trump deleted every male "life-supporter" from his campaign website 12 hours after the election.
author: David Emery
vclaim: All the mention of "life support" was deleted from the Donald J. Trump campaign website 12 hours after his election as president.
